name: firebase sickbay
description:
Among us

Imposter= a sick person trin to spread his decease

Tasks: Trying to make a vaccine

Game:

no one knows who the imposter is.

Emergency meeting pr minute

Timer to emergency meeting

Storyteller at the start

Unknown time for the disease to kill.

Time based/ when you reach a time the disease will kill all/ when all have been infected all will instantly die.

When hit by the disease you can know if you scan in medbay.

Disease has a range where it can infect others.

The disease infects other people at a sometime every X second or minutes.

If certain conditions are met the disease will infect others faster

Teleport

How to win:

Kill the infected or get him isolated.

Make a cure/ do all the tasks.

If the character is infected it will cough or sneeze, maybe it will do something else.

Some tasks need another task to be done.

When an infected has done a task the infection can spread, but if a certain time has been reaching the disease will die.

You lose if the disease has spread to all, or the tasks have not been done in a certain time.

If possible, a voice chat

Timer for stuff

Rooms:

Meeting room:

Med Bay Like

Security camera

Hallway

A room to check who is hit by the disease if they have been to the med bay and scanned positive.

Electricity room

Kitchen / cafeteria

Dresser room

Sleeping room/ that look like glass monitors like in space movies.

Entertainment room

Nuclear energy room

Experiment room

 

 

Maps:

South American/ Jungle Lab:

Laboratory:

Cave Lab:

Antarctician Lab

 

Lobby:

Transportation: Car, Ship, submarine, spaceship, or Plane

Log in screen among us character gif

Loading screen == Among us gif self-created

 

Abilities:

Fix stuff/ Repair button

Walking:

Open doors

Close doors if the doors are not closed the disease can spread in a wider range and it spreads faster.

Doing tasks

If infected, you can infect others.

 

 

Tasks:

Something you would need while curing a disease:

Preparing tests/ experiment

Take blood samples.

Update reports

Medbay checks if you have the disease: can check if you are positive or not.

Group based activities: example could be,

Something to do with fixing electricity.

Cleaning tools

Purification of water/ Heating up water.

Fix lights, when running you cannot see, and you might end up getting infected.

Play games.

Clean up after others.

Eat or drink.

Fold clothes

Prepare mask/ put up masks.

Prepare meals.
